page.title: 15 EMPLOYMENT IN MARTLESHAM
page.content:
52 people in Martlesham answered questions about their job and how they travelled to work. Most people work within 12 miles of Martlesham - only 8 work further afield than Felixstowe. 20 work in Martlesham itself, most of those being at British Telecom or on the Industrial Estate. 3 work at the Police Headquarters. The remainder work mainly in service industries such as insurance or engineering maintenance, or with the local authority. Six questionnaires were completed by housewives. There was only one farmer and one horticulturist.
Private car was the main way of travelling to work. 13 cycled to work, 3 walked and one travelled by bus.
